item.title: [317] need help , with npc moving. (please Help)
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Ok, I can help with with the first two deffinetly.And possibly the third.

To move the NPC’s location:

  1. Find the x:#### y:#### coordinates you want your NPC to be placed at.
  2. Once you have found them go to “autospawn.cfg”.
  3. When you get there you will see something like this

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 914 3179 3479 0 0 0 0 0 0
4. The first three numbers (or 914) are the NPC’s ID. The net four numbers (or 3179) are the x:#### coords. The next four numbers (or 3479) are the y:#### coords.
5. If you want to change the NPC’s location change the x:#### coordinate (or 3179) to the x:#### coordinate you have. And then you do the same with they y:####.

Read full topic
